page.title: 08St. John's Recreation Centre
page.content:
During the 1970's the Parish{football field and changing hut was the subject of an ambitious improvement project.
New changing facilities were the first improvements and were quickly followed by the addition of a{squash}court. The second phase added the Sir Billy Butlin Memorial Hall,(a large {Sports {Hall),}a further squash court, a lounge, a bar and a canteen.
An adjoining field was converted to a grass playing surface and the Centre now has outdoor facilities for{tennis, {cricket}and{soccer.
These amenities are well used by members, the Parish{Youth Club}and the children of the Parish who have also been provided with{swings,}a{see-saw and an{adventure playground.
